content.text: Hi! I'm a graphic designer and I work for myself. What do you do?
I am going to a home show to look for ideas for my dream larp room. What does that mean?
Larp is like live action role playing. I've never been to a home show, but it sounds like fun!
I'm 5'3" and love movie time. What are your hobbies?
I like to go to museums and exercise. I also do laundry on the weekends. What do you do for fun?
I can do convincing bird calls and I will teach my children to appreciate good music and be tolerant of others' tastes.
Wow, that's really cool! I'm not very good at bird calls.
It's a fun skill to have. I enjoy going to museums too. What's your favorite one?
I like the American Museum of Natural History. I like seeing all the different animals.
That's a great museum! I like going to the National Gallery of Art.
I've never been there. I'll have to check it out sometime.
It's really beautiful. I like going there to relax and enjoy the art.
Sounds like a great place to visit.
It is! I'm glad we're chatting. I'm learning a lot about you.
Me too! I'm enjoying talking to you
